attributes.action: Release the report investigating Russian interference into UK politics
attributes.additional_details: The report will provide an understanding of how foreign powers have tried, or succeeded, in influencing the political process in the UK.  This information is vital to help prevent any future attempts.
attributes.background: Before the December 2019 election a report into the alleged interference of Russia in UK politics and votes was completed.  This report has never been released to the public despite being of critical importance to the functioning of the United Kingdom's democracy.  It should be published immediately

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300059.
